name: LT Imprint
description: LT Imprint is a utility for LimeTray WebPOS users to print receipts and kitchen order tickets directly from their Android enabled smartphone/tablet to ESC/POS printers.  It currently supports the following printers  1. Bluetooth Printers 2. USB Printers 3. Network Printers 4. Shared Printers (requires Printer Service to be installed on Windows / Mac)  LT Imprint runs in the background and receives print requests from LimeTrays WebPOS running in your browser.
